name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sets your new tab page to a personal dashboard that displays the NASA astronomy picture of the day (APOD). This new tab page is beautiful, educational, and feature rich. 

The new tab page comes with a search bar supporting configurable search options to ZAPSurfer, Google, Bing and Yahoo. Date and time can be configured. Shortcuts are set to most visited websites but can be edited. Available in light and dark themes. Available in 10 languages.
